$DOGE  ‚Äî DESCENDING CHANNEL PRESSURE NEARS CRITICAL SUPPORT  Dogecoin continues to trade inside a long-term descending channel, with price now pressing into the lower boundary after a sharp sell-off. Momentum remains weak, and recent rebounds look corrective rather than impulsive. As long as DOGE stays below the descending trendline, sellers keep structural control.  A short-term bounce from channel support is possible, but failure to reclaim the breakdown area would expose price to a deeper continuation move lower. $DOGE 
DOGE is doing something very different. Price spent most of the session chopping inside a tight range, with a sharp liquidity sweep below 0.10 that was quickly reclaimed. That kind of move usually exists to clear weak hands, not to start a trend. However, the reclaim lacks follow-through. Price is back inside value, not expanding above it.
This reads as range continuation, not trend initiation. Until DOGE accepts above the prior highs near 0.106‚Äì0.107, it remains rotational. Loss of 0.10 again would reopen the downside liquidity pocket.

#Dogecoin #DOGE #DOGEUSDT

Good Sunday my fellow reader and Cryptocurrency trader, I hope you are having a wonderful day.

Let's look at Dogecoin now and see what the chart has to say.

This week continued red and we are now on the fourth red week, a prolonged retrace and bearish continuation. The action is finding support at a long-term ascending trendline; there is a double-bottom with the October 2025 market flush low.

Market conditions stay the same as before. Dogecoin continues to trade at bottom prices, near support. We can expect a reversal to happen anytime in the coming months. Once we hit bottom, the only place left to go is up.

There is a classic ABC correction, a really big one. A full bearish cycle is present on this chart lasting more than a year, so far 434 days. Trading volume continues to go down... These are bullish signals within a bearish chart; bullish potential.

Patience is key.
